dct_description_sm: View of the city and harbor of Rhodes; relief shown pictorially. Includes allegorial scene in foreground and mottoes in Latin and German above and below the map. In upper right-hand corner: H41. From: Sciographia cosmica, dasz ist, Newes emblematisches Buchleï, darinen in acht Centurijs die vornembstë Stätt Vestung, Schlösser &c der gantzen Welt, gleichsamb adumbrirt ... / durch Danielem Meisnerum ... Nürnberg : Bey Paulo Fürsten, 1642.
